title: dewilliams
author: dewilliams
content: I really wanna hear ur comments about this ,We have all lived in this country and we know what is good and bad in our country So what's ur own reply who is taking Nigeria to her promice land ??

comments.author: Newlifebtc
comments.body: Quote from: dewilliams on February 25, 2023, 07:33:28 PMI really wanna hear ur comments about this ,We have all lived in this country and we know what is good and bad in our country So what's ur own reply who is taking Nigeria to her promice land ??I think that Nigeria have a local board and that local board is where you are supposed to be writing anything that is concerning Nigeria not in public like this this election does not really affect every country and they will like the idea of making a comment because they don't really know what is happening in Nigeria and Nigeria is not among the word power whereby their election we are first picture of the country I think the best place to write this Nigeria local board

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: dewilliams on February 25, 2023, 07:33:28 PMI really wanna hear ur comments about this ,We have all lived in this country and we know what is good and bad in our country So what's ur own reply who is taking Nigeria to her promice land ?? I will advise you to move this thread to Nigeria Local board https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=275.0, because that is the best place to drop this thread.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: The president electÂ  Asiwaju is the only one among them that has a good track records and I believe he has the expertise to take the country to the next level. He did it in Lagos and he will do it again in Nigeria at large. Obi and Atiku has no records and good reputations, I don't trust them

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Any of them might take us to the next level, irrespective of their ages differences though,I don't really trust any politician, but I believe any one that emerges as the president after election and tribunal is the will of God and I believe he will take us to the next level...

comments.author: Odo1972
comments.body: Quote from: dewilliams on February 25, 2023, 07:33:28 PMI really wanna hear ur comments about this ,We have all lived in this country and we know what is good and bad in our country So what's ur own reply who is taking Nigeria to her promice land ??It's very obvious that Peter Obi was and still remains the people's choice. The greatest problem we're facing here in Nigeria is corruption and Peter Obi happens to be among the very few Nigerian politicians not indicted by any security agency for corruption.For me I believe he will do better but the problem is, will they (the cabal) allow justice to prevail?

comments.author: Ebede
comments.body: Quote from: Belarge on March 05, 2023, 07:39:46 AMAny of them might take us to the next level, irrespective of their ages differences though,I don't really trust any politician, but I believe any one that emerges as the president after election and tribunal is the will of God and I believe he will take us to the next level...We don't have to trust anybody or say that this particular politician will do more better and any other politician because I believe that all of them there are in the same group so you cannot say that this particular person can do more better than another or will take us to promised land and the other person so it is by the will of God that we can survive through a good leadership and the leadership is not by age it is by someone who have the people or the citizens interest at heart you'll be able to take her people to the promised Land

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: As a Nigerian, I will gladly say Peter Obi because of the records he set for himself when he was a governor of a state in Nigeria (Anambra).Secondly, he is the most vibrant and intelligent being compared to Tinubu and Atiku who lacks the ethics of understanding the suffering of Nigerians. The promised land won't be too far away for Nigerians to reach if, by chance, Peter Obi prevails in the tribunal against Tinubu. Yet if he doesn't, Nigerians would have to endure yet another 8 years of hardship.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on March 06, 2023, 11:22:23 PMAs a Nigerian, I will gladly say Peter Obi because of the records he set for himself when he was a governor of a state in Nigeria (Anambra).Secondly, he is the most vibrant and intelligent being compared to Tinubu and Atiku who lacks the ethics of understanding the suffering of Nigerians. The promised land won't be too far away for Nigerians to reach if, by chance, Peter Obi prevails in the tribunal against Tinubu. Yet if he doesn't, Nigerians would have to endure yet another 8 years of hardship. Obi would have take the worse president, I'm happy that Tinubu won. Obi would have found it difficult to have a competent cabinet, because he has not built a team like Tinubu, Tinubu will not struggle to make appointment, because he has political sons that are capable to turn Nigeria to true giant of Africa. I still advice Obi to use his obidient movement to get more states Governor in the coming election. Until he has more state Governors and sustain the obidient movement he will never be president. Atiku, past records are still fresh in the mind of Nigerians, especially he's Brothers, no one trust Atiku with the future and treasure of the nation. He Will never be Nigeria president. This was he last chance

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Lordhermes on March 07, 2023, 06:34:45 AMQuote from: Marykeller on March 06, 2023, 11:22:23 PMAs a Nigerian, I will gladly say Peter Obi because of the records he set for himself when he was a governor of a state in Nigeria (Anambra).Secondly, he is the most vibrant and intelligent being compared to Tinubu and Atiku who lacks the ethics of understanding the suffering of Nigerians. The promised land won't be too far away for Nigerians to reach if, by chance, Peter Obi prevails in the tribunal against Tinubu. Yet if he doesn't, Nigerians would have to endure yet another 8 years of hardship. Obi would have take the worse president, I'm happy that Tinubu won. Obi would have found it difficult to have a competent cabinet, because he has not built a team like Tinubu, Tinubu will not struggle to make appointment, because he has political sons that are capable to turn Nigeria to true giant of Africa. I still advice Obi to use his obidient movement to get more states Governor in the coming election. Until he has more state Governors and sustain the obidient movement he will never be president. Atiku, past records are still fresh in the mind of Nigerians, especially he's Brothers, no one trust Atiku with the future and treasure of the nation. He Will never be Nigeria president. This was he last chance You used the exact phrase that many people used to predict that Peter Obi wouldn't get any votes because he lacks a political structure in the nation before the election. After the election, they were shocked by what transpired in the election, of how Obi had received the majority of the votes in most of the states.A victory under a capable leader merits celebration. But, when a bad leader prevails, everyone becomes agonized. Is that not what we have observed so far after Tinubu was declared the winner of the presidential election in Nigeria by INEC? Don't you think there would have been a huge celebration everywhere if Obi had been declared the winner of the Nigerian presidential election?In all of this presidential discussion, let's not be overly sentimental. The presidential election this year exposed the INEC's lack of proficiency. Let's see how INEC defends itself in the tribunal by not announcing the 2023 presidential election using the BVAS result

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Quote from: dewilliams on February 25, 2023, 07:33:28 PMI really wanna hear ur comments about this ,We have all lived in this country and we know what is good and bad in our country So what's ur own reply who is taking Nigeria to her promice land ?? Peter Obi is wisdom personified, Nigerians have never had much interest or made a good decision and stood by it the way the stood by Peter Obi.I mean, that man has clearly won the heart of more than 90% of the citizens of Nigeria with his charisma, intelligence and past records, I believe he'll do well, I see the way things have turned out and it pains me that our voice was tamed, I just hope for the best with the court case.I think Tinubu would also have been a good option if be where much younger, the man's clearly to old to rule THE LAZY YOUTHS OF NIGERIA ðŸ¤£.Atiku has never been my man, I don't even know what's he's doing there.

Peter Obi is wisdom personified, Nigerians have never had much interest or made a good decision and stood by it the way the stood by Peter Obi.I mean, that man has clearly won the heart of more than 90% of the citizens of Nigeria with his charisma, intelligence and past records, I believe he'll do well, I see the way things have turned out and it pains me that our voice was tamed, I just hope for the best with the court case.I think Tinubu would also have been a good option if be where much younger, the man's clearly to old to rule THE LAZY YOUTHS OF NIGERIA ðŸ¤£.Atiku has never been my man, I don't even know what's he's doing there.The state of people who is funding for obi will it be the set of Will it be the same set of people who will destroy or bus government if assume or obi is the one that emerge the winner
